title: Can't install League
body:
So my LCU client on my laptop hasn't been working for a while now (it would blink black squares during every stage of the client), and every time i try/tried to use the legacy client I would receive the "pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working" error, so I tried to repair the client.  Didn't work, so I thought I would re-install the client.  Now whenever i click on the client after installing to download the rest of the game, it just gives me the "pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working" error and closes.  Any help?

Thanks

replies.body:
It sounds like your PC may not be launching League with the right administrative privileges. Try launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) and let me know if it worked this time. You can find this file in the directory below:

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**
I'm having the same problem, I tried that and it didn't work either
